remarks: A constructed one-slot structure with the objects of the category of sets as base set in a weak universe.  (Contributed by AV, 27-Mar-2020.)
statement:
setc1strwun.s $e |- S = ( SetCat ` U ) $.
setc1strwun.c $e |- C = ( Base ` S ) $.
setc1strwun.u $e |- ( ph -> U e. WUni ) $.
setc1strwun.o $e |- ( ph -> _om e. U ) $.
setc1strwun $p |- ( ( ph /\ X e. C ) -> { <. ( Base ` ndx ) , X >. } e. U ) $.
